@package drasil-system

-- | Define types and functions related to creating a system information
--   database.
module System.Drasil.System

-- | Data structure for holding all of the requisite information about a
--   system to be used in artifact generation.
data System
[SI] :: (CommonIdea a, Idea a, Quantity e, Eq e, MayHaveUnit e, Quantity h, MayHaveUnit h, Quantity i, MayHaveUnit i, HasUID j, Constrained j) => a -> SystemKind -> People -> Purpose -> Background -> Scope -> Motivation -> [e] -> [TheoryModel] -> [GenDefn] -> [DataDefinition] -> [InstanceModel] -> [String] -> [h] -> [i] -> [j] -> [ConstQDef] -> ChunkDB -> System
data SystemKind
Specification :: SystemKind
RunnableSoftware :: SystemKind
Notebook :: SystemKind
Website :: SystemKind
class HasSystem c_a8Un
system :: HasSystem c_a8Un => Lens' c_a8Un System
authors :: HasSystem c_a8Un => Lens' c_a8Un People
background :: HasSystem c_a8Un => Lens' c_a8Un Background
configFiles :: HasSystem c_a8Un => Lens' c_a8Un [String]
constants :: HasSystem c_a8Un => Lens' c_a8Un [ConstQDef]
dataDefns :: HasSystem c_a8Un => Lens' c_a8Un [DataDefinition]
genDefns :: HasSystem c_a8Un => Lens' c_a8Un [GenDefn]
instModels :: HasSystem c_a8Un => Lens' c_a8Un [InstanceModel]
kind :: HasSystem c_a8Un => Lens' c_a8Un SystemKind
motivation :: HasSystem c_a8Un => Lens' c_a8Un Motivation
purpose :: HasSystem c_a8Un => Lens' c_a8Un Purpose
scope :: HasSystem c_a8Un => Lens' c_a8Un Scope
systemdb :: HasSystem c_a8Un => Lens' c_a8Un ChunkDB
theoryModels :: HasSystem c_a8Un => Lens' c_a8Un [TheoryModel]
whatsTheBigIdea :: System -> IdeaDict

type Background = [Sentence]

-- | Project Example scope.
type Scope = [Sentence]

instance System.Drasil.System.HasSystem System.Drasil.System.System

module System.Drasil

-- | Data structure for holding all of the requisite information about a
--   system to be used in artifact generation.
